meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Laurie MacDougall Ben Foley Sally Neumann Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7327.

td.p: Laurie MacDougall, a cancer registrar originally from Medford, Massachusetts
Ben Foley, a structural engineer from New Orleans, Louisiana
Sally Neumann, a mental health counselor from Seattle, Washington (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,900)

tr.td: TAKE ME OUT OF THE BALL GAME
ORGANIZATIONS
SCIENTIFIC & MEDICAL ABBREV.
WORDS WITH FRIENDS
THE DISASTER OF THE CENTURY
THE 5 W's

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Dan Patrick presents the clue.) He retired in \'93, then came back to lead the Bulls to 3 straight titles; retirement & comeback no. 2... could\'ve gone better')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Sally
Ben
Laurie

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Sally
Ben
Laurie
FAMOUS ELEPHANTS
MEMORY
COUNTRIES WITH SHORT COASTLINES
AS EASY AS C-D-E
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with a "C" and be followed by a "D" and an "E" later on.)
BOOKS & AUTHORS
BIG SCREEN CHARACTER MASHUPS
(Alex: We give you parts of two roles by a famous actor, and you give us the actor.)
